topics.content:
# Pomodoro Plugin

A simple timer that follows the Pomodoro technique: 25 minutes of focused work, then a 5-minute break.

## Usage

Click the Pomodoro icon in the sidebar rail, then click Start. A timer widget appears in the status bar. When the timer ends, you'll get a notification. Completed sessions are tracked across restarts.
